document_data.mainbody:
A glowing blueleaf staff was an enchanted druidic staff found in the jungles of Chult in the late 15 century DR.
These staves were imbued with elemental magics that, when mixed with blueleaf tree sap, resulted in a wondrous glowing effect. the staves possessed a powerful +4 enchantments and strengthened abilities of the wielder druid as well as the druids allies.
Qawasha a druid of the Emerald Enclave from Chult in the late 15 century DR.
